content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'fare' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'nyc')
CREATE TABLE nyc.fare
	(
	 [medallion] nvarchar(4000),
	 [hack_license] nvarchar(4000),
	 [vendor_id] nvarchar(4000),
	 [pickup_datetime] datetime2(0),
	 [payment_type] nvarchar(4000),
	 [fare_amount] float,
	 [surcharge] bigint,
	 [mta_tax] float,
	 [tip_amount] float,
	 [tolls_amount] float,
	 [total_amount] float
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_fare
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO nyc.fare
(medallion 1, hack_license 2, vendor_id 3, pickup_datetime 4, payment_type 5, fare_amount 6, surcharge 7, mta_tax 8, tip_amount 9, tolls_amount 10, total_amount 11)
FROM 'https://thays3wnpwh332p4poc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/fares-data.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 13
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://thays3wnpwh332p4poc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM nyc.fare
GO
